name: demesne
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
old use an area of land owned and controlled by someone: The Forest of Dean was the king's demesne.
old use the land belonging to a manor (= a large country house): The enclosed fields of the manorial lord were known as the demesne.
literary part of a place or activity over which a person has control: The garden is Alice's little demesne.
